name: Vaughn Vernon
desc: Domain Model Whisperer. A champion of simplicity and everything reactive. The author of bestsellers: "Implementing Domain-Driven Design", "Domain-Design Distilled ", "Reactive Messaging Patterns with the Actor Model: Applications and Integration in Scala and Akka". Founder of vlingo/PLATFORM.
